heading: HR00210
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF PROTESTING FARMERS ON APRIL 01, 2016, DUBBED AS THE 'KIDAPAWAN MASSACRE', PERPETRATED BY ELEMENTS OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE THAT LED TO THE DEATH OF TWO (2) FARMERS, WOUNDING OF MORE THAN A HUNDRED, AND CHARGING OF EIGHTY-ONE (81) OTHERS WITH TRUMPED-UP CASES, AND CAUSED TRAUMA TO PREGNANT AND ELDERLY WOMEN WHO WERE AMONG THOSE ILLEGALLY DETAINED AND FALSELY CHARGED
principal-authors: BROSAS, ARLENE D.; DE JESUS, EMMI A.;
status: Pending with the Committee on HUMAN RIGHTS since 2016-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00210
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE VIOLENT DISPERSAL OF PROTESTING FARMERS ON APRIL 01, 2016, DUBBED AS THE 'KIDAPAWAN MASSACRE', PERPETRATED BY ELEMENTS OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE THAT LED TO THE DEATH OF TWO (2) FARMERS, WOUNDING OF MORE THAN A HUNDRED, AND CHARGING OF EIGHTY-ONE (81) OTHERS WITH TRUMPED-UP CASES, AND CAUSED TRAUMA TO PREGNANT AND ELDERLY WOMEN WHO WERE AMONG THOSE ILLEGALLY DETAINED AND FALSELY CHARGED
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BROSAS, ARLENE D., DE JESUS, EMMI A.
DATE FILED : 2016-08-10
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS ON 2016-09-19
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2016-08-17;
